name: trackr-objects
description: Turns JavaScript objects and arrays into reactive resources for Trackr.
author: Tyler Johnson <tyler@tylerjohnson.me>

scripts.build-browser: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/ && browserify ./src/index.js -t babelify --standalone TrackrObjects -o dist/trackr-objects.js && uglifyjs dist/trackr-objects.js -o dist/trackr-objects.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-browser
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build
